fixes.name: Delta Down Fix FX
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR FXConversion = SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As])
VAR deltaDownFix = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down Fix]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    FXConversion,
    "Reported", deltaDownFix,
    "Natural",
        SWITCH(
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[marketCCY],
            "AUD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_AUD],
            "CAD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
            "CHF", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CHF],
            "EUR", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
            "GBP", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
            "HKD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_HKD],
            "JPY", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_JPY],
            "MXN", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MXN],
            "NZD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_NZD],
            "SEK", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SEK],
            "SGD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SGD],
            "USD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
            BLANK()
        ),
    "CAD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
    "USD", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
    "EUR", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
    "GBP", deltaDownFix * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As]) and mapped nested CASE statements to SWITCH. All column and calculated field references were converted to the 'TableName'[Column] format. Returned BLANK() for Tableau's null.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The formula references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[FXConversion]); per rules, any parameter-based calculation must be created as a measure.
